title: Columbia mens Bugaboo V Pant
description: OMNI-TECH: For prolonged exposure to moderate rain and snow. Multilayered waterproof protection in a breathable material that releases excess heat and moisture, keeping you dry and comfortable no matter the conditions.

OMNI-HEAT: For versatile lightweight warmth in mild to severe cold. Our patented Heat Reflective garments are the ultimate body heat management system for outdoor performance. Reflects and retains body heat with breathable comfort, and enhanced warmth.
85% RECYCLED INSULATION: You'll feel good and warm knowing these pants incorporate Microtemp XF II insulation made from 85% recycled polyester.
KEEPS SNOW OUT: Perfect for skiing, snowboarding, and snowmobiling, these waterproof-breathable pants are critically seam-sealed to keep snow and moisture out.
HANDY FEATURES: Functional touches include adjustable waist tabs, zippered hand pockets, internal leg gaiters, and a lower leg snap gusset.
